title: Traptrix Nepenthis

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- You may target somebody; you play a random trap hole on them tonight.
- Blacklist three trap holes, you are unable to play them using your ability.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- For every eight trap holes played, a player receives the Traptrix win condition.
- The player is chosen based on who the host thinks is least likely to win.
- They gain not access to factional chat.
- You are not aware of who is converted.
- They do not gain access to factional kill.
- Your ability cannot use "Treacherous trap hole"
- You do not draw trap holes
